#include<iostream>
#include<string.h>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
	char s[1001];
	gets(s);
	
	int l,j=0,i;
	int count[1000] = {0};
	l = strlen(s);
	for(i=0;s[i]!=' ';i++)
	count[s[i]-'a']++;
	
	for(j=i+1;j<l;j++)
	count[s[j]-'a'] = 0;
	
	for(i=0;i<26;i++)
	if(count[i]!=0)
	cout<<(char)(i+'a')<<count[i];
	
	return 0;
}
